erillo was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Zerillo was a human boy with a light skin tone, dark brown hair, and dark brown eyes.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Zerillo attended a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the Murls Rest plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. The boy was in awe and wanted to grow up to be a wizard.
